title: Kylie Jenner singing 'Rise and Shine' in an epic mom voice has taken the internet by storm
text:
Kylie Jenner has become an internet meme after she sang "rise and shine" to wake her 1-year-old daughter Stormi. She is even selling "rise and shine" merchandise now. (Photo: Tommaso Boddi, Getty Images for Netflix)

You've heard of the "mom voice," right?

You know, that high-pitched, so-dang-proud, squeeze-their-guts-out voice that moms make when we are talking to our babies.

Well, Kylie Jenner used hers when singing "Rise and Shine" to wake her 1-year-old daughter Stormi – and let's just say it has taken the internet by storm.

It is probably the most ridiculous thing on the internet right now, but here we are.

The clip surfaced after Jenner shared a video on YouTube of herself giving a tour of her Kylie Cosmetics office.

All was well and quiet, until Twitter got a hold of it.

"Riiiiiiseee and shiiiiiine," Jenner sings in her best a capella as she walks into Stormi's room.

i can’t stop watching this i’m dying pic.twitter.com/J916bNRMIa — ˚✧benjamjn (@kylie_gender) October 14, 2019

This tweet alone as been viewed more than 14.5 million times. Then of course, the memes came.

wst

Kris Jenner is prolly out there looking for a music producer for Kylie lolpic.twitter.com/UP1mpL8zHz — westhingy (@wsthingy) October 18, 2019

did i make another rise and shine by @KylieJenner tik tok? maybe... pic.twitter.com/ZWUJPTYK57 — ellie (@_ellieee14) October 17, 2019

My ex waking me up to tell me it’s over pic.twitter.com/xmkPmvChfE — Nick Lehmann (@NickStopTalking) October 17, 2019

So there's that.

But here comes the best part: Jenner is OWNING it to the point that the youngest "self-made" billionaire is now selling "Rise and Shine" merchandise.

At least she is taking it in stride. After Twitter erupted, Jenner immediately took to Instagram with a meme of her own, a reference to the "Teletubbies" sun baby.

"No caption needed," she wrote.

Then, Jenner hit us with this adorable video of Stormi listening to a "Rise and Shine" remix.

Stormi appears to love it right up until she realizes that it is mommy singing and not her daddy, rapper Travis Scott.

"Daddy sing?" Stormi asks Jenner.

"Oh you want daddy singing? I'm not good enough?" Jenner says.

Hmmmmm, not really. Sorry, mama.

All we can hope for now is that Ariana Grande really turns this into a hit and moms everywhere can wake up their babies to the beautiful sounds of Jenner's voice.

description: It was an innocent moment when Kylie Jenner sang "Rise and Shine" to wake up her 1-year-old daughter Stormi. The internet has feelings. Jenner has merch.
